mapper.insert: INSERT INTO RoomList (roomNum, accountNumber, title, category, numberTotal, period, dueDate, privateOrPublic) VALUES (#{roomNum}, #{accountNumber}, #{title}, #{category}, #{numberTotal}, #{period}, #{dueDate}, #{privateOrPublic});
INSERT INTO PersonList (roomNum, id, role) VALUES (#{roomNum}, #{id}, '팀장');
mapper.update: UPDATE RoomList SET title = #{title}, category = #{category}, numberTotal = #{numberTotal}, period = #{period}, dueDate = #{dueDate}, privateOrPublic = #{privateOrPublic} WHERE roomNum = #{roomNum} AND accountNumber = #{accountNumber};
